h2_title: Cyan Loong Boss Fight and Guide
content: The good news is his final sword slice allows for an extended moment to dodge around and attack him from behind. However, you'll need to keep your eyes open when trying to attack from behind, as he can easily whip his mace-like tail around to hit you. Watch for it to rise up to the top left before slashing down to the bottom right to know when to deflect or evade.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Cyan_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Cyan Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Cyan Loong Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
The good news is his final sword slice allows for an extended moment to dodge around and attack him from behind. However, you'll need to keep your eyes open when trying to attack from behind, as he can easily whip his mace-like tail around to hit you. Watch for it to rise up to the top left before slashing down to the bottom right to know when to deflect or evade.
